calculations.name: new date
calculations.tableau_expression: IF [Start date]>[title date] THEN [Start date] ELSE [Maturity Date] END

calculation_context.Expression: IF [Start date]>[title date] THEN [Start date] ELSE [Maturity Date] END

calculated_fields.title date: if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] THEN [Max Date] ELSE  [Parameters].[End Date] END
calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
